ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_1: Hi! I'm a passionate web developer focused on creating dynamic and user-friendly websites. My name is Anja, my strengths lie in frontend development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Angular. I prioritize clean, well-structured code and always strive for optimal solutions to complex problems.

REFERENCES_TEXT: Check what colleagues and business partner say about me.
REFERENCE_1: Anja is very organized at work and never loses her calm. She is always polite and fully dedicated to her projects. Her positive attitude and friendly nature make her great to work with. I would be happy to work with her again.
REFERENCE_2: She is a communicative and friendly team member who is a true asset to any group. Even in stressful situations, she remains focused and calm. She has a talent for problem-solving and is always focused on finding effective solutions. Working with her is always a pleasure!
REFERENCE_3: She is a communicative and friendly colleague, an absolute asset to any team. She remains focused and calm in stressful situations, and with her talent for problem-solving, she is always dedicated to finding effective solutions. It is a pleasure to work with her!

PRIVACY_POLICY_HTML:
Privacy Policy

Welcome to My Website

Protecting your personal data is important to me. This privacy policy describes how I collect, use, and protect your data.

Contact Form

When you use the contact form on my website, the data you provide (name, email address, and message) is used solely for the purpose of contacting you. This data will not be shared with third parties.

Use of Data

The collected data is used exclusively for the following purposes:

  • Contacting and responding to your inquiries.
  • Registration and use of the project pages.

Project Pages

Join Projekt

This is a task manager modeled after a Kanban board. There is an option for registration, login, and guest access. These data are only for demo purposes to view the project.

Sharkie

A game developed in JavaScript. No registration is required here.

Sharing of Data

Your personal data will not be shared with third parties unless required by law.

Reference to German Law

This privacy policy refers to the legal provisions of the German Data Protection Act (GDPR).

If you have any questions or concerns about data protection, you can contact me via email at anja_schwab@gmx.de.
